alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 8:27PM CST until January 30 at 5:28PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Rises continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1130 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Thursday the stage was 85.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 89.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall to 86.7 feet Saturday evening. It will rise above flood stage early Sunday afternoon to 92.1 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
